name: Automatons Enslaved to Masculinity
description: The socialization of boys in patriarchal societies often normalizes violence, such as in the saying "boys will be boys" with regard to bullying, aggression, and harassment. How can we teach our young boys and men to be caring, respectful humans when the patriarchy tells them otherwise?  This collage portrays men attempting to break free from these toxic behaviours which have been engrained in them for generations. Stripped bare and exposed, a struggle between the heart and the brain. Men following men, trying to out-do each other, to prove who is the alpha male. The world is watching and scavengers are standing by to pick at the remains. 7200px X 7200px By @dehiscenceart 2020
